shared.communication

Class CreateGameRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.communication.CreateGameRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CatanCommand

    public class CreateGameRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements CatanCommand
    The name and settings to use for the new game. Can be sent as form encoded key-value pairs as well. The new game's ID can be read from the response.
    Author:
    Cache Staheli

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreateGameRequest

        public CreateGameRequest(boolean randomTiles,
                         boolean randomNumbers,
                         boolean randomPorts,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Creates a CreateGameRequest with the specified options and name.
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - whether the created game will have randomly generated hexes.
        randomNumbers - whether the created game will have randomly placed numbers on the hexes.
        randomPorts - whether the created game will have randomly placed ports.
        name - the name of the game.

      • CreateGameRequest

        public CreateGameRequest(java.lang.String json)
        Instantiate a CreateGameRequest from JSON.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON of the CreateGameRequest
